textBox.richText: The midterm is behind us, a quick look at the responses suggests that you did well. We will have another ‘midterm’ for the program verification part of the class. These exams are important as they give you feedback and also are a good indication of the kinds of questions that will appear on the final. If you do ok in both, you should have no problems later. Looking ahead. This Friday we will continue with program analysis in the morning session. In the PSO, I will give the answers to the midterm and comments on your code for PA2 (which you are in the process of fixing for PA3). Next week, we will cover Data Flow Analysis in the lectures and start our project on Java bytecode verification. For this, we will form groups (2/3 pers per group). We will also start our LightningTalks series with the paper “Who should fix this bug”. Volunteers to present those are more than welcome / short of one I will assign the papers.
